org.lightningj.paywall.vo

Class NodeInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.JSONParsable
      • org.lightningj.paywall.vo.NodeInfo

  • public class NodeInfo
extends JSONParsable
    Value object containing connection information to a Lightning Handlers Lightning node. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-11-11.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NodeInfo.NodeNetwork
      Enumeration of available Node networks the LND node can be connected to.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeInfo

        public NodeInfo()
        Empty Constructor

      • NodeInfo

        public NodeInfo(java.lang.String publicKeyInfo,
                java.lang.String nodeAddress,
                java.lang.Integer nodePort)
        Default Constructor
        Parameters:
        publicKeyInfo - the public key info of the lightning handlers node. (Optional)
        nodeAddress - address information to the lightning handlers node. (Optional)
        nodePort - port the node is listening on for channel connections. (Optional)

      • NodeInfo

        public NodeInfo(java.lang.String publicKeyInfo,
                java.lang.String nodeAddress,
                java.lang.Integer nodePort,
                NodeInfo.NodeNetwork nodeNetwork)
        Default Constructor
        Parameters:
        publicKeyInfo - the public key info of the lightning handlers node. (Optional)
        nodeAddress - address information to the lightning handlers node. (Optional)
        nodePort - port the node is listening on for channel connections. (Optional)
        nodeNetwork - indicator which the network the LND node is connected to (UNKNOWN is default). (Optional)

      • NodeInfo

        public NodeInfo(java.lang.String connectString)
         throws InternalErrorException
        Constructor populating data from connect string
        Parameters:
        connectString - the full connect string with publicKeyInfo@nodeaddress:port, where port is optional.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if given connect string was invalid.

        Throws:

      • getConnectString

        public java.lang.String getConnectString()
        Returns:
        the full connect string of configured publicKeyInfo@nodeaddress:port, where port is omitted if not set.

      • setConnectString

        public void setConnectString(java.lang.String connectString)
                      throws InternalErrorException
        Setter using connect string. This method will parse the string and populate publikKeyInfo, nodeAddress and nodePort.
        Parameters:
        connectString - the full connect string with publicKeyInfo@nodeaddress:port, where port is optional.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if given connect string was invalid.
